general.adblockerActivated: Per favore, disattiva il tuo ad-blocker affinché il modulo funzioni correttamente e aggiorna il tuo browser.
general.unableToFetchData: We were unable to fetch datas, please try again later.
general.legendCreateNewAccount: Hai anche la possibilità di creare un nuovo account in pochi passi:

header.title: Marketing con Google
header.text: Mostra i tuoi prodotti su Google e raggiungi milioni di acquirenti che cercano attivamente ciò che offri sulla rete di Google.
header.reinsurance:
- Impostazione facile 
- Annulla in qualsiasi momento

content1.title: Fai trovare i tuoi prodotti agli acquirenti interessati
content1.text: Le inserzioni gratuite ti permettono di elencare gratuitamente i tuoi prodotti nella scheda Shopping e di mostrarli ai potenziali clienti nel momento esatto in cui stanno cercando ciò che il tuo negozio offre*.

content2.title: Mostra sempre informazioni accurate sul prodotto
content2.text: Una volta che hai caricato i dati del tuo negozio e dei tuoi prodotti su Google direttamente da PrestaShop, queste informazioni saranno disponibili e sincronizzate automaticamente per le liste gratuite, Google Ads e altri servizi di Google.
content2.footer:
Create a new [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"] or link an existing one.  
To show your products on Google you’ll need to meet the [eligibility requirements]({1})[:target="_blank"]

content3.title: Aumenta il traffico e le vendite con la campagna Smart Shopping
content3.text: Reach even more customers with paid ads and grow your sale by promoting your products to the right customers across Google Search, Shopping, YouTube, Gmail, and the Display Network thanks to technology powering Smart Shopping campaigns**

content.notice:
*depending on regional availability   
 **includes campaign optimization to show variety of ads of your products to customers most likely to buy them

footer.text: Fai trovare i tuoi prodotti su Google con PS Marketing con Google

sectionTitle.freeListing: Porta i tuoi prodotti su Google con inserzioni gratuite
sectionTitle.smartShoppingCampaign: Raggiungi più persone con la campagna a pagamento Smart Shopping

onboarding.productFeedNotice: Aiuta i clienti a trovare più facilmente i tuoi prodotti su Google e inseriscili gratuitamente con inserzioni gratuite. Le inserzioni gratuite aiutano a raggiungere più clienti e a fare in modo che visitino il tuo sito.

multiShopSelector.title: Modalità multi-negozio attivata
multiShopSelector.subtitle: Devi configurare i tuoi negozi uno per uno per questo servizio, ma sarai in grado di utilizzare lo stesso account.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Seleziona il primo negozio da configurare dall'elenco che segue
multiShopSelector.tips: After you are done with the first shop, you can configure the others by selecting them one by one in the shop selector, in the horizontal menu

psAccountCard.disonboardedText: Authorize your account to manage your shop’s services
psAccountCard.onboardedText: Il tuo negozio è associato all'account PrestaShop

googleAccountCard.title: dell'account Google
googleAccountCard.introDisabled: Connetti il tuo account Google e associalo a Google Merchant Center per sbloccare le inserzioni gratuite.
googleAccountCard.introEnabled: Accedi attraverso il modulo PrestaShop associato al tuo account e-mail Google Merchant Center e agli account Google Ads.
googleAccountCard.footerDissociating: PrestaShop utilizza questo account per gestire e sincronizzare gli account Merchant Center e Google Ads.
googleAccountCard.alertCantConnect: In questo momento non puoi connetterti al tuo account Google. Riprova più tardi.
googleAccountCard.alertTokenMissing: Non siamo stati in grado di autenticare il tuo account. Prova di nuovo o passa a un altro account.
googleAccountCard.alertInfo:
Make sure to allow all requested permissions when authenticating your Google account.  
This action is mandatory for this service to work properly.
googleAccountCard.missingTokenScopes:
Some requested permissions are missing.  
All requested permissions are mandatory for this service to work properly, please manage your account and make sure to allow all of them.

mcaCard.title: Account Merchant Center
mcaCard.introDisabled: Associa il tuo account Merchant Center a PrestaShop per facilitare la sincronizzazione dei dati del tuo negozio e dei prodotti
mcaCard.introEnabled: [Google Merchant Center]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"] helps you get your store and product info into Google and make it available to shoppers across Google.
mcaCard.claimCollides: Il tuo sito web è già stato richiesto.
mcaCard.claimOverwrite: To finish Merchant Center account creation, you need to overwrite the existing claim.
mcaCard.footerEU:
If you are in the European Economic Area, the United Kingdom or Switzerland your Merchant Center account must be associated with a [Comparison Shopping Service (CSS)]({0})[:target="_blank"]  
If you create a new Merchant Center account through this application, it will be associated with Google Shopping, Google’s CSS, by default. You can change the CSS associated with your account at any time. [Find your CSS Partners]({1})[:target="_blank"]  
Once you have set up your Merchant Center account you can use our onboarding tool regardless of which CSS you use.
mcaCard.shopInfoMissingDescription: To complete missing store information please go to your [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"].
mcaCard.userIsTestAccount: Questo è un account di prova
mcaCard.shopMaintenance:
You cannot connect a Google Merchant Center account while Maintenance mode is active.  
 Please change your shop parameters.
mcaCard.toUseGmcNeedsAdminAccess: To use an existing Merchant Center account, you must have Admin access.
mcaCard.linkingFailed: In questo momento non puoi connetterti al tuo account Merchant Center. Riprova più tardi.
mcaCard.unlinkFailed: Disconnessione fallita. Riavvia la pagina e riprova.
mcaCard.tryAgainLater: We can’t verify or claim the current site. Try again later.
mcaCard.alertSuspended: Il tuo account è stato sospeso.
mcaCard.alertSuspendedDescription: To see more details on the reasons for suspension, please visit your [Merchant Center account]({0})[:target="_blank"]. Once resolved you will need to request a new review by filling out [this form]({1})[:target="_blank"].
mcaCard.overwriteFailed: Richiesta di URL del sito web fallita
mcaCard.overwriteToBeDoneManually: Your website has been already claimed on another merchant center account. As we are not administrator of your account, we cannot overwrite this claim for you. Please go to your [Google Merchant Center]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"] , and change the Website URL with this one : {1}
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListing: Il tuo account non è idoneo per le inserzioni gratuite perfezionate su Google
mcaCard.ineligibleForFreeListingDescription: Esamina le disapprovazioni a livello di prodotto così come l'intero account.
mcaCard.claimOverwriteWithManualAction: To finalize your Google Merchant Center account connection, you need to provide your website URL ({0}) in your Google Merchant Center account.
mcaCard.newGmcNotListed: In attesa della pubblicazione del tuo account
mcaCard.newGmcNotListedDescription: If you just created a new account, it means Google is still building it. You have to wait or come back later. This operation can take up to 5 minutes on Google side. In other cases, check that your GMC is still existing, and that you still have rights on it.
mcaCard.phoneVerificationNeededDescription: Per poter utilizzare il tuo account Merchant Center devi verificare il tuo numero di telefono
mcaCard.phoneVerifiedContinue: Your phone number has been verified, you can continue your account creation.
mcaCard.enterCode: Inserisci il tuo codice a sei cifre
mcaCard.textMessageHasBeenSent: Un messaggio di testo contenente un codice a X cifre è stato appena inviato a
mcaCard.askAgain60sec: Potrai chiedere un nuovo codice fra 60 secondi
mcaCard.needPhoneVerification: Abbiamo bisogno di verificare il tuo numero di telefono per assicurarci che sei veramente tu
mcaCard.fillInputs: Inserisci il tuo numero di telefono e seleziona il tuo prefisso internazionale
mcaCard.invalidCode: Your code is invalid, please check your code or ask for a new one.
mcaCard.selectMethod: Seleziona il metodo di contatto desiderato per verificare la tua identità
mcaCard.alertTooManyRequests: Hai richiesto questo servizio troppe volte con questo numero di telefono. Devi aspettare 24 ore per riprovare o cambiare il tuo numero di telefono.
mcaCard.alertSomethingHappened: Something happened. It's on our side, please try again.
mcaCard.alertCodeExpired: Il codice è scaduto. Si prega di chiederne un altro

mcaRequirements.title: Crea un nuovo account Merchant Center
mcaRequirements.legend: Per partecipare alle inserzioni gratuite e fare pubblicità su Google devi confermare e rispettare i seguenti requisiti:
mcaRequirements.legend2:
Store's website URL needs to be verified and claimed before you can upload products data.  
[Learn how to verify and claim your website](https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/176793?hl=en&ref_topic=3163841)[:target="_blank"].
mcaRequirements.footer: Leggi la versione completa dei requisiti per il negozio Google

shoppingAdsPolicies.title: Rispetta le politiche degli annunci di Shopping
shoppingAdsPolicies.description: Don’t promote prohibited content or use prohibited practice to advertise. Respect restricted content policy and quality standards for your ads and website.
shoppingAdsPolicies.link: Leggi le politiche degli annunci di Shopping

accurateContactInformation.title: Fornisci informazioni di contatto accurate
accurateContactInformation.description: Merchants need to have at least one contact method listed on their website, this can be any type of contact method.
accurateContactInformation.link: Scopri come aggiungere informazioni di contatto

secureCheckoutProcess.title: Fornisci un checkout e una raccolta di dati personali sicuri
secureCheckoutProcess.description: Do not misuse information about user, nor collect it for unclear purposes or without appropriate security measures.
secureCheckoutProcess.link: Impara a riconoscere la raccolta e l'uso irresponsabile di dati

returnPolicy.title: Fornisci una chiara politica di resi e rimborso
returnPolicy.description: La politica di resi e rimborso deve essere chiara (includere i requisiti e le scadenze) e di facile accesso sul tuo sito web.
returnPolicy.link: Impara come impostare le politiche di reso

billingTerms.title: Fornisci termini e condizioni di fatturazione
billingTerms.description: Website needs to clearly and visibly disclose payment options and all expenses that user will bare, before and after purchase.
billingTerms.link: Leggi le linee guida del Merchant Center

completeCheckoutProcess.title: Fornisci un processo di checkout completo
completeCheckoutProcess.description: Gli utenti devono essere in grado di completare con successo il processo di acquisto.
completeCheckoutProcess.link: Scopri i requisiti per il checkout

mcaRequirements.websiteURLDescription: Il sito web utilizzato per creare il tuo account Merchant Center
mcaRequirements.storeNameDescription: Questo nome apparirà nelle tue inserzioni gratuite e negli annunci Shopping.
mcaRequirements.changeCountryField: You can [change your country]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeRegionField: You can [change your region]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeAddressField: You can [change your business address]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeZipCodeField: You can [change your zipcode]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changeCityField: You can [change your city]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.changePhoneNumberField: You can [change your business phone number]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"text-decoration-underline text-muted\"] informations in your back office
mcaRequirements.siteContainsAdultContent: Il mio sito web contiene contenuti per adulti
mcaRequirements.seePolicyAdultContent: Vedi la politica sui contenuti per adulti
mcaRequirements.labelReadAndAgree: By purchasing Shopping ads, I have read and agree to comply with [Google's terms and policies]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"], including [Google’s Merchant Center terms of service]({1})[:target=\"_blank\"], [Shopping ads policies]({2})[:target=\"_blank\"], and [Google Ads Terms and Conditions]({3})[:target=\"_blank\"].
mcaRequirements.alert: Your store will be reviewed so if one of these requirements is missing, your account will be suspended.
mcaRequirements.phoneFormat: Il tuo numero di telefono aziendale non è in un formato valido (accetta solo numeri) per favore cambialo.
mcaRequirements.updateData: If you have made any modification in your backoffice, please refresh your information to see the changes reflected here.

productFeedCard.title: Sincronizza automaticamente i dati dei tuoi prodotti con Google
productFeedCard.intro: Invia i dati dei tuoi prodotti direttamente al tuo Merchant Center e tienili sempre aggiornati per inserzioni e annunci gratuiti.
productFeedCard.introToConfigure: It's important to submit your product feed in the correct format, as Google uses this to make sure your products match the right queries.
productFeedCard.syncSuccess: Products synced {1} at {2} | {0} product synced {1} at {2} | {0} products synced {1} at {2}
productFeedCard.alertFeedSettingSubmissionSuccess:
You have successfully submitted your product data to Merchant Center.  
 Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertFailed: Product sync was not successful. Check possible reasons in [Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] or contact [customer support](mailto:support-google@prestashop.com).
productFeedCard.alertShippingSettingsMissing: Shipping settings are missing. Once your shipping settings configured, you will be able to sync your product data. [Add shipping settings]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"]
productFeedCard.alertShippingSettingsMissingDescription: To successfully sync your product data, add shipping info.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedDeactivated: If the product sync is deactivated, there will be no new products pushed into the GMC. The account itself will continue to exist and the products will expire after 30 days. This stops the catalog items to show on both Free Listings and the ad campaigns.
productFeedCard.alertProductFeedExists:
**A product feed already exists**  
  <small>Your product feed already exists. You need to overwrite it to sync your PrestaShop product feed.</small>
productFeedCard.googleTaxonomyAssociation: Associazione della tassonomia dei prodotti di Google
productFeedCard.attributeDescription: With these attributes, you can organize your advertising campaigns in Google Ads and override the category automatically assigned by Google in some cases.
productFeedCard.alertGoogleIsReviewingProducts:
Your products are being reviewed  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
productFeedCard.alertErrorApi: Non puoi inviare i dati dei tuoi prodotti a Google in questo momento. Riprova più tardi.

steps.shippingSettingsErrors: Questo paese non è compatibile con la tua valuta

productFeedSettings.noticeDataStored: Settings are saved at each step, will be submitted only at the final step.

shipping.ifMultipleCountries: If you target multiple countries, each product price will be automatically converted to the correct currency in Google. However your store must have configured shipping and tax rates for each selected country. Please respect [country-specific shopping policies]({0})[:target="_blank"] and [local regulation]({1})[:target="_blank"]
shipping.productAvailaibleIn: I miei prodotti sono disponibili in
shipping.placeholderSelect: Seleziona i paesi in cui i tuoi prodotti sono disponibili
shipping.cantFindCountry: Can’t find a country? Only supported countries are listed. [See list of supported countries]({0})[:target="_blank"]
shipping.shippingSettingsErrors: Questo paese non è compatibile con la tua valuta
shipping.shippingDescription1: PrestaShop will import your carriers list from your store settings and allow you to provide additional information.
shipping.shippingLabel2: Skip and setup later in Google Merchant Center
shipping.shippingDescription2: You will have to enter your product shipping information yourself in Google Merchant center.
shipping.noticeSetupShipping: Your products won’t sync until you setup your products shipping information.
shipping.taxSettingsDescription: So that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for a product, you must submit the taxes that you collect. Select how you want to set up tax settings.
shipping.autoImportTax: Importa automaticamente le impostazioni delle imposte
shipping.manualImportTax: Imposta manualmente le impostazioni delle imposte in Google Merchant Center
shipping.alertTaxes: You must submit the taxes that you collect, so that users understand the exact price that they’ll have to pay for your products.
shipping.cantSelectCountryWithDifferentCurrency: Non puoi selezionare un paese con una valuta diversa da quella del tuo negozio principale.
shipping.shipToCustomerTooltip: Select if this carrier delivers to a customer’s address or not (service point, in store pickup). Google only allows enabling carriers who ship to an address.
shipping.handlingTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes you to prepare an order until it’s picked up by the carrier in working days.
shipping.transitTimeTooltip: Enter how long it takes for your order to be shipped to the customer once it leaves your facility.
shipping.shippingInformationIntro: Enter shipping information for your carriers list. They have to ship to an address to be synchronized in Google Shopping.
shipping.shippingTableNotice: Make sure your store message matches your Google shopping delivery time information.
shipping.carriersDropdownHiddenLabel: Copy information of the carrier to other carriers
shipping.noCarriersTitle: You don’t have any shipping carriers
shipping.noCarriersDescription: Please head to carriers page to add shipping carriers
shipping.refreshCarriers: Refresh if you have edited your carriers

export.prohibitedContentNotice: Please review the [prohibited content guidelines]({0})[:target="_blank"] to ensure that products in your feed don’t violate these policies.

attributeMapping.title1: 1. Choose all characteristics that apply to your products
attributeMapping.description1: This will allow you to map mandatory Google product attributes at the next step depending on your catalog.
attributeMapping.title2: 2. Map mandatory Google attributes to your custom fields
attributeMapping.description2: Fill in all values to ensure your products are validated. If a value is missing in your catalog, we recommend you create it and complete the setup later.
attributeMapping.apparelAndAccessoriesSubtitle: i.e clothing, bags, shoes or hats
attributeMapping.electronicsTitle: I sell Home and/or Kitchen appliances
attributeMapping.electronicsSubtitle: i.e refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, light bulbs
attributeMapping.variantSetsSubtitle: i.e different graphic prints, patterns, fabrics or materials
attributeMapping.learnRequirementsProductSpecification: Learn more about requirements & supported values for the Shopping product data specification
attributeMapping.footerNotice: Describe your product data using attributes. Additionally to required minimum for standard free listings, you can add additional attributes required for enhanced listing. General rule is: the more attributes the better.
attributeMapping.addNewAttributes: Add new attributes in your PrestaShop Catalog
attributeMapping.refreshAttributes: Refresh if you have edited your attributes
attributeMapping.requiredForSomeCategories: This field is required for some product categories. [See more]({0})[:target="_blank" class="external_link-no_icon"]
attributeMapping.learnAboutShippingSettings: Per saperne di più sulle impostazioni di spedizione

summary.totalProducts: Prodotti attivi pronti per la sincronizzazione
summary.mandatoryAttributesNotMapped: One mandatory attribute hasn't been mapped to your custom fields | {0} mandatory attributes haven’t been mapped to your custom fields.
summary.noticeToCompleteMapping: We recommend completing all your data to ensure your products are validated. [See more]({0})[:target="_blank" class="external_link-no_icon"]

freeListingCard.title: Show your products with free listings
freeListingCard.intro: Metti in mostra il tuo prodotto gratuitamente in un elenco classificato organicamente nella scheda Shopping.
freeListingCard.learnFreeListing: Per saperne di più sulle inserzioni gratuite
freeListingCard.seeFreeListing: Guarda i miei annunci gratuiti in Merchant Center
freeListingCard.googleDelay: Ci vogliono 3-5 giorni lavorativi per rivedere i prodotti
freeListingCard.alertEnableFreeListing: Abilita le inserzioni gratuite per mostrare i tuoi prodotti sulla scheda Shopping gratuitamente.
freeListingCard.alertCantEnableFreeListing: Non puoi abilitare le inserzioni gratuite in questo momento. Riprova più tardi.
freeListingCard.alertCountryNotEligible: Il paese di destinazione che hai selezionato non è idoneo per le inserzioni e gli annunci gratuiti.

googleAdsAccountCard.title: Collega il tuo account Google Ads
googleAdsAccountCard.intro: Lancia una campagna pubblicitaria per i tuoi prodotti e raggiungi più utenti attraverso quattro diverse reti di Google.
googleAdsAccountCard.text: Una volta connesso, potrebbe essere necessario configurare le impostazioni di fatturazione nel tuo account Google Ads.
googleAdsAccountCard.labelSelect: Collega un account Google Ads esistente
googleAdsAccountCard.toUseGAdsNeedsAdminAccess: To use an existing Google Ads account, you must have Admin access.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCantConnect: Could not connect your Google Ads account, it's on our side, please give it another try.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertBillingSettingsMissing: To launch Smart Shopping campaigns, you need to add your billing settings in your Google Ads account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterBilling: Once filled in your billing info in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedRefreshAfterInvitationLink: Once the invitation is accepted in your Google Ads account, refresh the page to view updates.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertNeedValidationFromEmail: Per favore, clicca qui o controlla le tue e-mail per convalidare il tuo account.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertSuspended: Devi risolvere i problemi nell'account Google Ads.
googleAdsAccountCard.alertCancelled: Devi risolvere i problemi nell'account Google Ads.
googleAdsAccountCard.learnAboutAccountSuspension: Per saperne di più sulla sospensione dell'account
googleAdsAccountCard.learnAboutAccountCancellation: Per saperne di più sulla cancellazione dell'account

googleAdsAccountNew.title: Crea un nuovo account Google Ads

email.title: Il tuo indirizzo e-mail di Google
email.description:
This information will be used to create your account.  
Google email address below is the one provided during your Google account connection.

business.name: Nome
business.title: Informazioni sull'azienda
business.description:
Both time zone and currency settings are used to determine how you\'re billed.  
**You can never change the currency** you choose for your account, so choose it carefully.
business.placeholderCountry: Seleziona il tuo paese di fatturazione

terms.title: Termini di servizio per il programma Google
terms.description: By purchasing Shopping ads, I agree to comply with [Google Ads terms and conditions]({0})[:target=\"_blank\" class=\"ps_gs-fz-12 text-muted\"]
terms.label: Ho letto e accetto questi termini

smartShoppingCampaignCard.title: Aumenta le vendite con le campagne di Smart Shopping
smartShoppingCampaignCard.intro:
Boost visibility of your products with paid Smart Shopping Campaigns.  
Ads will be increasingly displayed to the right people at the right time.

smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameHelper: Il nome deve essere unico e di 125 caratteri al massimo.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputNameTooltip: Scegli un nome che descriva chiaramente il tema della campagna in modo da poterlo trovare facilmente nel tuo account. Il nome della tua campagna non è visibile ai tuoi clienti.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationHelper: Raccomandiamo una durata minima di 30 giorni in modo che Google possa ottimizzare la tua campagna.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDurationTooltip: Ad campaigns have no end date by default, so that the ads are able to run indefinitely. You can always add an end date to create a shorter campaign.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputDatePickerHelper: Usa i tasti del cursore per navigare tra le date del calendario
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryHelper: Per mirare a più paesi devi creare più campagne.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryImutable: Country can't be changed after creation, if you want to target a different country, you'll need to create a new campaign
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputCountryTooltip: Your campaign’s ads are eligible to show to customers in your targeted geographic locations, or to customers who have selected your targeted language as their browser’s language setting.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersPartialLabel: Seleziona i prodotti usando i filtri di partizione dei prodotti
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputFiltersHelper: Take some time to [read Google Shopping ads policies]({0})[:target=\"_blank\"] some product are prohibited or restricted.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetHelper: Pagherai solo se qualcuno clicca sul tuo annuncio.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetInvalidFeedback: Your daily budget must be a valid number greater than 1. For any decimal number, please use a dot as separator.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.inputBudgetTooltip: Your budget is the average amount you’re comfortable spending each day on your campaign. The budget you choose is entirely up to you, and you can adjust it at any time.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.formHelperDescription: La tua campagna verrà eseguita fino a quando non la metterai in pausa. Puoi mettere in pausa la tua campagna in qualsiasi momento.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorNoProducts: You want to launch a campaign, but your Google merchant center does not contain any products yet. Your campaign will start only when at least one product has been approved by Google.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.errorApi: We were not able to publish your campaign, please try again.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapNoFiltersDescription: Tutti i prodotti sincronizzati approvati da Google
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.recapFooter: Controlla le informazioni della tua campagna prima di convalidarla. Puoi sempre modificare alcuni parametri mentre la campagna è in corso.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationRemarketingTag: Enable remarketing  tags on my site
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleCreationNewRemarketingTag: Crea un nuovo tag di tracciamento del remarketing e delle conversioni da aggiungere al tuo negozio
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.enableCreationRemarketingTag: Abilita il tag di tracciamento del remarketing e delle conversioni
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.pauseCampaign: La tua campagna sarà attiva fino a quando non la metterai in pausa o non appena si arriverà alla data finale. Puoi metterla in pausa in qualsiasi momento.

alerts.noTag: Non aggiungendo il tag automaticamente Google non sarà in grado di inviare i risultati delle campagne
alerts.duplicatedTag: Looks like you already have a tag linked to your google account, creating a new tag can duplicates events for your campaigns. We suggest to only keep the one we generate for you.
alerts.noConversionActions: The tracking tag has been enabled, but there is no conversion action set on the shop. This can be fixed by creating new ones.

smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbDimensionSelected: Nessuna dimensione selezionata | {0} dimensione selezionata | {0} dimensioni selezionate
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbValuesSelected: Nessun valore selezionato | {0} valore selezionato | {0} valori selezionati
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.selectProductsSubtitle: Seleziona i filtri che vuoi aggiungere alla tua campagna Google Ads
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.remarketingNote: **Please note:** if you already have Google Ads Conversion Actions with transaction-specific conversion values configured on your site for this Google Ads account, then you do not need to set new conversion tags on your site.
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleNewConversionTag: Imposta nuovi tag di tracciamento delle conversioni sul sito
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.toggleNewConversionTag2: We will create the following conversion tags : Page view, Purchase, Add to basket
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.remarketingTagLoading: Stiamo controllando se hai tag di tracciamento del remarketing e delle conversioni da aggiungere al tuo negozio
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.descriptiveMessage:
Only the smart shopping campaigns associated to your Google Merchant Center account are listed.  
If you want to see all your campaigns, [please go to your Google Ads Account]({0})[:target="_blank"].
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbProductsFiltersSelected: No product filter selected | {0} product filter selected | {0} products filters selected
smartShoppingCampaignCreation.nbProductsSelected: No product selected | {0} product selected | {0} products selected

alert.googleIsReviewing:
Your products are being reviewed  
 It might take 3-5 days to review your products. Once approved, they will be available for free listings and ads.
alert.alertSuccess: You are successfully opted in. Once your products are approved, they can appear in Google Shopping tab search results.

syncStatus.title: Stato delle sincronizzazioni
syncStatus.readyForExport: Il feed di prodotto è pronto per l'esportazione
syncStatus.alert: Product sync was not successful. Check possible reasons in [Merchant Center]({0})[:target="_blank"] or contact [customer support](mailto:support-google@prestashop.com).

productStatus.title: Stato del prodotto
productStatus.description:
The status of your product lets you know if your product is eligible to appear in the destination you’ve opted into.  
A pending product won't show in ads or free listings because it's being reviewed by Google.  
Expiring products will expire in the next 3 days, and will no longer be eligible to appear in ads or free listings.
productStatus.alert: Ci vogliono 3-5 giorni lavorativi per rivedere i prodotti

approvalTable.description: Lo stato dei prodotti che sono sincronizzati con Merchant Center

errorReason.incorrectInfos: Errori di battitura e altre informazioni mancanti o errate
errorReason.invalidDatafeedLocation: Posizione del file del feed dei dati non valida

campaignCard.title: Crea la tua campagna di Smart Shopping in pochi clic
campaignCard.description:
Google A.I. will display ads of the searched products to interested shoppers at the right time increasing your sales.

Set a daily budget and easily launch your ads campaign - you only get billed when the ads are clicked, it\'s that easy!
campaignCard.footer: Dovremo attivare i tag di tracciamento del remarketing e delle conversioni perché tu possa eseguire campagne di Smart Shopping

keymetrics.title: Metriche chiave
keymetrics.impressionsTooltip: Conteggio di quante volte il tuo annuncio è apparso su una pagina di risultati di ricerca o su un sito web della rete di Google.
keymetrics.clicksTooltip: When someone clicks your ad, like on the blue headline or phone number of a text ad, Google Ads counts that as a click.
keymetrics.conversionsTooltip: The number of conversions. This only includes conversion actions which include_in_conversions_metric attribute is set to true. If you use conversion-based bidding, your bid strategies will optimize for these conversions.
keymetrics.averageCostPerClickTooltip: Il costo totale di tutti i clic diviso per il numero totale di clic ricevuti.
keymetrics.costsTooltip: La somma dei tuoi costi di costo per clic (CPC) e costi di costo per mille impressioni (CPM) durante questo periodo.
keymetrics.salesTooltip: The value of conversions. This only includes conversion actions which include_in_conversions_metric attribute is set to true. If you use conversion-based bidding, your bid strategies will optimize for these conversions.

tooltipCol.status: A status for your ad campaign that describes whether or not its ads can run at the moment.

help.title: Assistenza per PrestaShop Google
help.intro: PrestaShop Marketing makes it easy to connect your store with Google and promote your products to millions of shoppers across different networks like Google Search, YouTube or Gmail. Create Smart Shopping campaigns without leaving your PrestaShop dashboard and drive more traffic.

allowsYouTo.title: Questo modulo ti permette di:
allowsYouTo.easySync: Easily sync your product catalog with Google to keep product details such as price and availability automatically updated
allowsYouTo.freeListing: Enable free listings and broaden your reach by showing your products to shoppers browsing on the Shopping tab, for free
allowsYouTo.ssc: Get started with Smart Shopping campaigns, set a daily budget and let Google’s smart technology optimize your campaigns
allowsYouTo.reporting: Analyze your campaign performance without leaving PrestaShop

help.needHelp: Hai bisogno di aiuto? Trovate qui la documentazione di questo modulo.
help.couldntFindAnyAnswer: Non hai trovato nessuna risposta alla tua domanda?

glass.message:
Can't see Google secured browser?  
  Hit Continue to relaunch the window and finish configuration.  
  You may need to activate popups in your browser to continue.

modal.textDisconnectGoogleAccount: You are about to disconnect Google account. This will remove access to Google, Google Merchant Center and Google Ads accounts.
modal.textDisconnectMCA: Disconnecting your Merchant Center will remove access to your Google Ads in this module and pause any running campaign.
modal.textoverwrite:
Overwriting existing claim will deactivate your previous account and pause existing campaigns tied to that account- free listings and Shopping campaigns.  
If you are running a different Shopping campaign, we recommend pausing it.
modal.textDisableFreeListing:
By disabling free listings your products will no longer be available for organic listing on Shopping tab.  
 However your product feed will stay available.
modal.textEnableFreeListing: Questa azione causerà anche la riattivazione del feed dei prodotti.
modal.textCancelProductFeed: You will lose all unsaved changes if you Continue. To successully submit your product data to Google, you need to complete all steps.
modal.titleOverwriteProductFeed: Sovrascrivi il feed dei prodotti esistente?
modal.textOverwriteProductFeed: Sovrascrivendo il tuo feed di prodotti esistente lo cancellerai. Dovrai configurare un nuovo feed di prodotti.
modal.textDisconnectGoogleAds: La disconnessione dal tuo account Google Ads rimuoverà la possibilità di eseguire campagne Smart Shopping dal modulo.
modal.pauseCampaigns: Metti in pausa tutte le mie campagne
modal.pauseCampaignsExplainations: By pausing all your campaigns, the billing will stop. You can restart your campaigns at any time in your Google ads account.
modal.removeTag: Rimuovi il tag "Remarketing e conversioni" dal negozio
modal.removeTagExplainations: Rimuovere il tag significa che Google non sarà più in grado di tracciare le tue campagne. Ti consigliamo di rimuovere il tag solo se hai intenzione di rimuovere completamente il modulo o di cambiare il tuo account. Puoi sempre aggiungerlo tu stesso nel codice del tuo sito.
modal.titleActivateTrackingSSC: Abilita il tag di tracciamento del remarketing e delle conversioni
modal.textActivateTrackingSSC:
In order to run Smart Shopping campaigns, Google Ads needs to be able to create [remarketing list]({0})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] and [conversion tracking tag]({1})[:target="_blank" class="text-decoration-underline text-muted"] on your site.   
 PrestaShop will automatically set these code snippets on your shop.
